attributes.action: Mark end of Covid- 19 with Bank Holiday & authorise UK wide Street Party
attributes.additional_details:
At the time of me writing this around one in five people around the globe are under lockdown. 

This has been a very isolating time for some and a worrying time for all. 

It is my belief that giving the communites preauthorisation for a street party when it is medically safe to do so will give people HOPE, something to plan for & bring people together.
attributes.background: I want the Government to mark the end of the pandemic with a bank holiday and pre-authorisation for a nationwide street party.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304513

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
